mosinstall.name: RSGallery2 Todd Flash Player
mosinstall.author: rsgallery2.net
mosinstall.copyright: This component is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: Generates a Todd flash player to display a gallery from RSGallery2. Visit the official site for FAQ, support forums and latest news: RSGallery2.net

param.name: gid
param.label: Gallery ID
param.description: Enter the ID of the gallery to show. Check the Gallery Manager in RSGallery2 to find the gallery ID.

param.name: imageSize
param.label: Image Size
param.description: Choose which size of the image to display.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Do not change parameters below this line.
param.description: This flash player is buggy. The below parameters sometimes cause things to stop working. Reinstall this module to reset to defaults if it stops working.

param.name: timer
param.label: Timer
param.description: Number of seconds between each image transition.

param.name: order
param.label: Order
param.description: How you want your images displayed.

param.name: looping
param.label: Looping
param.description: If in sequential mode, start again after last image.

param.name: fadeTime
param.label: Fade Time
param.description: Velocity of image crossfade. Increment for faster fades, decrement for slower. Approximately equal to seconds.

param.name: xpos
param.label: x Position
param.description: x position of all loaded clips.

param.name: ypos
param.label: y Position
param.description: y position of all loaded clips.
